ygData.subject: Re: Blacksmithing
ygData.msgSnippet: make sure you used a forge and not something else, heh.... sharpening stone and weapon are the only 2 things you need though.... it would be wise to throw 15
ygData.messageBody:
make sure you used a forge and not something else, heh....
sharpening stone and weapon are the only 2 things you need though....
it would be wise to throw 15 training poiints into it also, but you are
looking at about 150 plat to get your skill high enough to make money, so dont
start unless you know you can get that.

Ryan wrote:

> From: Ryan <rwp3@...>
>
> If I want to start blacksmithing, I was told to start on Rusty daggers. Do
> I just combineone with a sharpening stone in a forge? I tried it one and
> it told me my skill was not good enough, but when I tried it 2, 3, 4, 5,
> and 6th times it said that "those materials in those quanitites (1 dagger,
> one stone) was not enough to produce anything. Did I miss a step?
>
> Reppik
> Paladin of the 8th Order
>
